divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing in a field , near a beach when me and my two friends looked up too see a ship hovering, it stood still for about 3 seconds after we made eye contact with it, and then zoomed away and out of sight in a split second , it seemed to be silver, very bright, very fast, and not of this world , we were quite shocked, and didnt speak for about a minute afterwards , and then ran to our cottege
Summary: me and two friends looked up and saw a ship hovering , it then flew off at incredible speed ....
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Moncton
There were no other sightings in Moncton on or around August 11th 1996
